Separate (wash).en: Wash contents of {from_vessel} with {solvent} ({n_separations} x {solvent_volume}). Transfer waste phase ({waste_phase}) to {waste_phase_to_vessel} and product phase ({product_phase}) to {to_vessel}.
Separate (wash).zh: 用{solvent} ({n_separations} x {solvent_volume})洗涤{from_vessel}中组分. 转移废液相 ({waste_phase}) 至{waste_phase_to_vessel} ， 转移产品相({product_phase}) 至{to_vessel}.
Separate (wash).ru: Промыть содержимое {from_vessel} с помощью {solvent} ({n_separations} раз(а) по {solvent_volume}). Отработанную фазу ({waste_phase}) слить в {waste_phase_to_vessel}, фазу с продуктом ({product_phase}) - в {to_vessel}.

Separate (extract).en: Extract contents of {from_vessel} with {solvent} ({n_separations} x {solvent_volume}). Transfer waste phase ({waste_phase}) to {waste_phase_to_vessel} and product phase ({product_phase}) to {to_vessel}.
Separate (extract).zh: 用{solvent} ({n_separations} x {solvent_volume})萃取 {from_vessel}中的组分. 转移废液相 ({waste_phase}) 至废液瓶{waste_phase_to_vessel} ， 转移产品相({product_phase}) 至容器{to_vessel}.
Separate (extract).ru: Экстрагировать содержимое {from_vessel} с помощью {solvent} ({n_separations} раз(а) по {solvent_volume}). Отработанную фазу ({waste_phase}) слить в {waste_phase_to_vessel}, фазу с продуктом ({product_phase}) - в {to_vessel}.

Separate (solvent_free).en: Separate two-phase mixture in {separator}, transfer {waste_phase} (top) to {separator} and {product_phase} (bottom) to {buffer_flask}.
